category: Public Architectural Review Committee Regulations/Article 12 (Exclusion and avoidance of members)
contents: Article 12 (Exclusion and avoidance of members) ① Members of the committee cannot perform services for public construction projects ordered by the Sports Council. ② If any of the following applies, a member may not participate in the deliberation and resolution of the committee meeting. 1. If the member, his or her spouse, or immediate descendant is an executive, employee, or shareholder of a corporation or organization that performs services related to the architectural planning work and business conducted by the Sports Association. 2. Provides services or serves as an advisor in relation to the work and business subject to deliberation. 3. If there are other significant reasons why the relevant duties cannot be carried out fairly. ③ If any of the reasons in paragraph 2 applies, the member himself avoids the deliberation and resolution of the matter, or the chairperson excludes him. shall.
